newsitem.title: INDIA: India's National Stock Exchange halts trade.
newsitem.headline: India's National Stock Exchange halts trade.

text.p: India's National Stock Exchange (NSE) on Friday stopped trade for 30 minutes on account of technical problems, traders said.
A NSE message flashed to its members at about 1400 hours (0830 GMT) did not say if the exchange would extend trading hours.
The NSE is open for trade from 1000-1530 hours (0430-1000 GMT). The NSE's 50-stock index ended 11.30 points, or 1.09 percent, higher at 1,049.50 on Friday.
